articles.title: Asia to Join Global Equity Rally Ahead of US CPI: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Stocks in Asia and European and US equity futures climbed as a plan for Donald Trump and Xi Jinping to meet eased nerves around a trade war. Treasuries were steady ahead of US inflation data.

articles.title: Target eliminating 1,800 positions, laying off 1,000 workers - Star Tribune
articles.description: The Minneapolis-based retailer said the goal is not to cut costs but to make operations more agile. Affected employees won’t find out until Tuesday.

articles.description: The Cambodian national is charged with running scam compounds that stole from people all over the world.

articles.description: The Trump administration is in early-stage conversations with quantum computing companies to discuss potential financial support for an industry that’s part of the growing race with China for technology supremacy.

articles.title: The government is belatedly releasing inflation data on Friday. Here's what economists are expecting. - CBS News
articles.description: Economists think inflation around the U.S. continued to climb in September, edging farther away from the Fed's 2% annual target.

articles.title: Average long-term mortgage rate drops to lowest level in more than a year - PBS
articles.description: The average rate on a 30-year U.S. mortgage fell again this week, dropping to its lowest level in more than a year.

articles.title: David Ellison may have a ‘Trump card’ — literally — in Warner Bros. Discovery pursuit - CNN
articles.description: The Paramount Skydance CEO is “undeterred” after WBD rebuffed his first three offers, sources say, and Ellison’s allies are privately arguing he’s the only buyer who’d pass muster with Trump administration regulators.
